data.text: This game is addictive, simple, and cute to play! An amazing game to play if you wanna pass by time. I love that it's customizable and there are just so many things you can do! Although the one thing that is bringing it down to a 3 star is that if you wanna change servers to play with a friend or leave a toxic world, you have to start all over. It's very sad and annoying. It would be a 5-atar if you could change servers and keep your progress.
data.replyText:
Hello, thank you for your comment.
Welcome to contact our gm via Discord Messenger if you have any question about the game. We will try our best to help you. Sincerely waiting for your arrival. Discord Link：https://discord.gg/rgX9GT9h4S

data.text: The devs allow this game to reduce the volume of all your other apps without your permission and it's mandatory. Also, who thought it was a good idea to have your mushroom evolve into an anime human not even that far into the game? So lame.

As a new game there's still lots to change and adjust. This game is actually good, I enjoy the customization options! Really cute lol. But something you need, gold, exp need to drop from enemies no matter what. You get stuck and the only way is by summons to get gold and exp. You get stuck and you have to wait til a reset. As I'm having to replay a stage because I can't beat the boss I'm literally stuck...no gold, xp or lamps drop. Change those and push more content and this game is great!

Pay to play basically, and 95% pay to win so don't waste your time trying this game. To progress you're almost required to spend money. The events are 90% pay to participate. Good luck completing the 7 Day trial challenges without spending. The level progression is trash as well and instead of basing it off of enemies you're killing its based off of items recieved which come at a slow rate so you're more likely to pay to progress.
data.replyText: It's common for mobile game to offer the option of top up to boost their power in a short time.But we focus more on long efforts of players' daily farming and team work.Give the game some time.It's more than that. If you have any ideas, welcome to contact us via FB Messenger:https://www.facebook.com/legendofmushroom

data.text: Game advertises as idle, but it isn't. You power up by equipment. Which you must open 1 lamp/box at a time. There is a shake animation, then you compare stats and decide to sell or equip. You get a lamp for each area you beat, and 4 for each boss area, among other ways. Your idle time that you are aware also generates lamps. So you are stuff just looking at a screen of equipment for like 75% of the game. Your game won't progress unless you rinse and repeat the repetitive animations.
data.replyText: Hi! Thank you for your comments and there would be many interesting gameplays in game. Have a try! It won‘t let you down. Also if you have any good ideas please pay more attention on our facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/legendofmushroom

data.text: Seems fun but a few issues. 1, lamp builds up too quick and it's impossible to use them all. 2, the "free 3000 draws" have to be earned by stages. 3, no real story. The only story is a girl saying oh no the village is being attacked again. No goals set. No finishing the game. Again, seems promising and I hope the devs take my advice into consideration.

data.text: Installed and bought the Ad free tier for about $10. The game will keep you solidly busy for a week with clicking achievements. Then you will slow down and focus on events. No point in strategy because all your skills become worthless as you upon the next rarity tier. You can get 1/10th of a weekly event completed for free, and need to spend $50+ to get the guaranteed rare win of the event. If you can't get the end event content from regular play, it's not worth it. Hope they fix the meta.

data.text: This game is really cool! I love the small character Customization unlocks which only make me want to play it more. The reason I gave 2 stars, however, is that no matter how much I progress past level 1-10, it still won't give me the rewards or unlocks for it. Idk if this is a game glitch, but I would appreciate the devs looking into it.

I am tired of games gatekeeping the settings options until I get to a certain point or past their tutorial. The very first thing I want to do is go to the settings and adjust the music and sounds volume, but this game requires you to reach level 16 first!!! That's insane!!! Uninstalled.
data.replyText: Hello, it's not true .thank you for your comment. Welcome to contact our gm via facebook Messenger if you have any question about the game. We will try our best to help you. Sincerely waiting for your arrival. facebook Link：https://www.facebook.com/legendofmushroom

data.text: I like the game mechanics and the art and everything. My one issue is that when I went to change servers (because there was a lot of people on the world chat on the server I originally logined into saying a bunch of slurs and being hateful), it reset all of my progress. I feel like I should be able to change servers without have to start all over. Please fix this.

Games not bad just a little slow... and tedious. The main thing that bothers me is the ads, i did an ad to speed the timer... and it give me an x to close it after the time... I hit the back button on my phone and it worked... but it then Installed the game for the add... I never accepted that... bad and shady adds means a bad game usually... I'll update this post in a few days.

data.text: Woukd be a 4 star game but im taking away 2 stars for the false advertising. The ads also said over 3000 free draws for pre registering i only got 50. Now for the game. Typical idle battle game where your player automatically fights enemies from the right. One at a time. When you beat so many then the boss comes with slightly higher HP and a little higher damage. As you kill enemies it drops tickets to gain loot and coins to purchase level ups. Tickets drop commonly. No bugs yet

data.text: The game is a lot of fun but it's difficult to play whenever the chat is at the bottom and plants take 5+ hours well not just plants. It also has a really toxic fan bas as seen in the discord and in game chat. But it does have a nice system but it does take forever for you to build up lamps and it seems it's gonna go under as another pay to win IDLE games. I would hate to see it make it to that demise. Otherwise though things, I would recommend the game for a game you play for 1-2 hours a day.👍

data.text: The game has a fun, colorful art style, but the aesthetics are the best part of the game. The detailed stats menu is helpful, and I wish more games implemented this. However, it's hardly an idle game in that it requires a lot of button pressing, and even then, there isn't much choice in where there could be. Most of the interaction is through how the game asks you to spend money, practically begging with advertisements for a shiny weapon or gatchas. Disgraceful and disappointing.

data.text: The game is cute but otherwise pretty bland. You tap the lamp, get an item, equip it, or sell. Rinse repeat. Leveling is slow. People will steal your crops if you are low level because you are an easy target, and there is nothing you can do since most people you can request for help ignore it. The game is just quite boring. After about 2 days, I found myself not even bothering to play. Much better games out there for sure.

data.text: I was intrigued by the promo images of what looked like a roguelike dungeon crawl. Instead this game is the worse configuration of idle game and rpg. All the fun parts of playing are automated: spells, combat, exploring levels... But you get to pause all progression to check if piece-of-trash armor 1 is better than piece-of-trash armor 2. This is the only way to get stronger; xp and leveling are tied to selling gear, not combat or quests or, well, anything fun. I feel duped.
data.replyText: It is normal that the advertisement is a little exaggerated. Please refer to the actual situation of the game. We would report to our team and suggest them to adjust the ads. Thank you for your concern. If you have any good ideas, welcome to contact us via facebook Messenger：https://www.facebook.com/legendofmushroom

data.text: I was trying to connect the game to my Google play account, but for some reason it didn't want to and kept assigning me a temp. Email login. I had to delete it so that i can retry it but i ended up getting the same results. I just gave up and deleted the game. I don't want to go to far into the game and have it connect later down the line to just delete all of my progress.

This game feels the same way it feels to walk into a casino - lots of noises and flair and wild amounts of overstimulation and distractions, making it exciting - except everything is also pushing you to spend money. There's so many different leaderboards and of course it's pay to win. There's so many different elements that push you to compete with everyone else, even your friends. There's several different gacha mechanics. If you like that, then sure, go have fun with this game.

data.text: I was drawn in by an ad that made it sound like a little peaceful mushroom village where you can farm. I admit, I jumped in without any kind of research and downloaded the game. When you open it, there's no explanation, no opening scene, you are instantly watching a cartoon mushroom fighting bad guys. Like, all you do is rub a lamp and try to figure out how to upgrade armor and weapons while the mushroom fights. I played for a few rounds to see if there was any story, but if there is, idk.

Pay to win game and full of ads. Not worthy the time if you are a free players. It's one of those games whith whales that are impossible to ever beat them. Free players have to watch full ads to be able to progress in a decent pace, there's no option to skip the ads after 5 seconds or so. The game itself has a good concept, but it becomes not worthy due to P2W and ads.

love the game and the community for the most part, lots of stuff going on at once but still manageable, perfect for my adhd mind. the animations are adorable and really intricate, but thats a problem for my phones temperature, it heats up every time i play. i wish i could toggle all the animations and not just the skill animations, lite mode doesnt really stop my phone from overheating. thats the only issue tho, the game is otherwise fantastic ✨

Awesome game, aren't really gated by much things like you'd expect from a game like this. I have yet to put any money into the game and I'm really far into it. Unfortunately, if you rely on just watching ads to get some extra goodies for the day, sometimes the ads won't give you your reward. If you take too long to go through the ad (you go do something else while the ad plays) you'll be disconnected from the servers and wont get anything. Sometimes it also just flat out doesn't work regardless

data.text: The game is fun but has the worst customer service. I purchased the ads free to later find that it's character bound meaning you have to purchase it over and over if you choose to change server to start over with a friend. When I ask to provide feedback the response is just "that's the rule". This is extremely misleading. And I don't know any other game that does this.

data.text: still in the early stages of the game but so far it has peaked my interest. im sure theres alot more to come as this is a new game. the micro transtions are cheap but dont seem worth the price besides some random deals that comd up. also all the sponsored ads include codes but so far only 1 has worked and i had to enter it 4 or 5 times before it accepted it. some of the ads ive watched for speeding up progression didet actually give me the thing i watched the ad for.

It's a great little game, suffers from the whole burst gameplay. Lots to do at first, quickly goes away. Don't be tempted to spend, as it really gets you no where a few days in unless you want to continue to pay (a lot) daily. it is not an idle game, you HAVE to keep the game open at all times to make progress. You only earn lamps during online AFK which is not great for a mobile phone. It wants all of your time. Would be so much better if it had true idle support as advertised.

data.text: My experience with the game was nice, but I will put 1 ⭐ cause idk if the developers cares my problem if I don't put it. In some parts of the game, the game desborde the RAM and crash. My mobile is a Moto E5 with 16gb of RAM. It's not really bad. The game should be optimized for fix that. I really like the game and I want to play it without the crashes. Thanks. (If the problem is fixed, I will update my review to 4 ⭐, cause it's my opinion of the game not counting the crashes)

This game started off amazing until I've found out about the colossal pay wall that all of the benefits are behind of, it'd be so much more fun to actually compete with players but the power gap is too high as a f2p player. Its impossible to keep up because people actively spending money on the game have too great of an advantage and its frustrating

I'd say that Legend of Mushroom is a really fun game where you endlessly fight monsters and other enemies. I like how unique this RPG game is and how diverse it is. Unfortunately, the game is a little p2w (pay to win) which makes it a little annoying. Overall, i'd rate it a 4.5, because it's a decent game.

This is very much pay to win. Its trying to consistently push payed items in your face. You can't progress fast enough so it's forcing you to pay to keep up and get better. Every 10mins it's asking you to buy some sort of diamonds. Even with paying the amount you get is no where near enough to progress forcing you to buy more. Is this game worth 100 dollar no it's not worth to get 6 levels higher for 100 dollars

Your experience starts off slow but once you gain speed, you can really go for it. It's not hard to become top 100/50 even if you don't pay. progress is fine and all. The game mostly relies on luck for the items and that. They need to make the text boxes longer and the censorship needs fixing because you can't even say "game". Other than that it's a pretty good game.

The game starts off rather quickly but as you progress further and further, it gets slower and slower. Until you're at a stand still waiting for the day to reset. Not enough ways to obtain needed stuff when you use them for the day unless you pay. Everything runs out too fast like dungeon keys, and amongst other things. It's a waiting game with nothing to occupy your time in between day resets. Also make boss timers longer or get rid of the timer.

In and of itself the game is a great collection of every kind of idle clicker you would never want. The downside is there is zero moderation. Every other person has nude/sexual explicit use profile photo, racist usernames, or spam chat bypassing the censorship filter and allowed to post audio clips that are mainly sexual/porn sounds.
data.replyText: Hello, I'm very sorry for causing you a bad experience. We will continue to monitor the game's chat channel. If you find that a player has made inappropriate comments,, kindly please contact us via facebook Messenger：https://www.facebook.com/legendofmushroom

data.text: I love the art style and relative simplicity of this game. There's no forced ads, and rewards are really good. It's not entirely idle, as you do have to check stats of gear pretty often, but it's not necessary unless you want to get stronger (rather than earn coins/XP)

This is a pretty fun game, but there are two huge problems: 1. EXP gain is slooooow and 2. The percentages for gear are criminally low once you start trying for orange and red gear. If this game was truly AFK it wouldn't be a problem, but as is you have to leave the game open for hours per day for marginal benefits

The game is great, minus all the ads for micro transactions. The game can be paid to play, if you buy into the $29.99 and $19.99 lifetime premium packs which allow you to skip the Ads, the only thing you'd be purchasing at that time is conveyance. As the lifetime premium pack for $19.99 gives you gems, etc., for the entire games lifespan. Don't know how true to this that advertisement in game is. However, the case I am enjoying myself and if time allows will purchase both premium packs.

it is good to burn time and is a good game idea def try out it's super easy I played for a day and I'm Level 33. also I never get ads when I'm just playing I only get them when I request one to get an item. basically what I'm saying is It's a good time waster, easy to get into and grind, simple mechanics and instructions, and it's just awesome sauce. sorry for writing a paragraph 😘 ≤))≥ | \ _| \_

Changing my previous review, one start down. The " event " is nothing else that a way to puch up purchases, you win in the rank if you spend more?! On top of that the system can't do simple math. I equipped a gear that have more stars than the previous one and my power goes down. So in pvp players with power of 1000 can easily beat players with power of 2000 ... so what is the point of getting better gear?

This is a mircotransaction simulator, not a game. They literally tied every aspect of the game to micros. Want to level up? Nope you run out of lampsbl but no worries you buy them. Skills under leveled? Buy more pulls to upgrade. Pretty scummy imo. Making a game and a profit is fine. However, the level of mircos in this game are egregious. I'd rate lower if I could. Trashcan devs.

data.text: Enjoying this game so far! I love that we have customizable characters and can choose paths. Can't wait to see what comes out! Would love to see a story added or something that would be cool. The only issue I've had so far is that I pre-registered for it and didn't get the pre-register title. Other than that it's great and fun and I've already made some friends :>

The game is great so far... Not the chat. The chats that show up on the screen are inappropriate. I would like an option to mute the world chat if desired. Changing servers erases work Ive already done and is not practical!

Downloaded yesterday and had a lot of fun. This morning can’t open the game, error saying "Key resource loading failed check network" and I don't know how to resolve it. Tried uninstalling and reinstalling.

data.text: Would rate 5 stars if it didn't have sound priority over other apps and set its own max volume limit for every other app while it is open. It lowers the volume amd keeps it there unless you reset the music app.

How is this game number 1 in its respective chart, you're just clicking a lamp to get gear 90% of the time and I find myself looking at selling or equipping the gear than I do to anything else on screen, its advertised as idle but the only idle part is the character fighting and I'm clicking the screen every couple of seconds, not my kinda thing uninstalled.

Im a game tester i have a few things i like and dislike about this pros: quick progression, people are nice, game is entertaining. Cons: stuck on 10-1 without buying anything, was alittle confusing to get things together at first, hard to find settings to change the sound if you want it off... will update more as i play more

Meh. It's decent. I'm super annoyed that I cannot adjust the volume in game until lvl 16. I listen to podcasts on this same device while playing and can't hear it due to the game. Lost interest much quicker as a result. Lvl 10 with 30+ min of playing.

data.text: Not at all what it seemed from pre-registration photos. This game is nothing more than an idle lamp clicking game. I didn't have much expectations but your time would be better spent on almost anything else. Chat filters are ridiculous too and even the lamp clicking is too slow.

It's good so far no forced ads only optional ones for rewards so that's a plus easy to understand gear set and what to do easy progression no level stops or anything yet so I'll play this for while.....it is f2p friendly can progress without buying anything but the events are not can't get costumes or any type of bouns items without spending

I'd leave no stars if I could. I really hate theft. This game steals a lot from Skul: The Hero Slayer - play style, abilities, first boss and landscape/environment. It doesn't look like they even tried to change it enough to make it their own (I knew which game it had stolen from *immediately*). What happened to being creative and original? What happened to game ads actually being about the game they're advertising for?

data.text: The game itself is good. You can get hooked on quite easily. I am rating 1 star because I won Limited award in Pinwheel contest, and it was not delivered. One incident of dishonesty is enough to cause mistrust. I won't support the game until limited reward is delivered to me as shown. The discord server support system is also full & no way to contact customer care. This is all very fishy.

This game had a lot of potential but became a cash grab. The idea of choosing different classes and customizing your character is fun, and I loved how some events included other players. But the chat system is horrible. For some reason, the devs allow audio speech, which either consists of immature behavior, insults, or death threats. The chat system cannot be turned off and has the absolute worst filtering, basically blocking words that shouldn't be blocked and censoring anything LGBT.

So I've encountered a bug, apparently I don't have access to my pet, it said I need to finish 0-10 but I'm at level 4-6 or something like that, to recreate this bug you'd have to first finish 0-10 and then ignore the option to press on your pet, I did this by accident I was on a different menu so I exit out of that menu to try to go to pets but after exiting my menu I couldn't select pets, said I needed to unlock it.

I have already put in 10 hours into this game however there are a few issues. First of all the application is extremely battery draining and heats up phone quickly even with lite mode on. The genie quests latter on past level 9(I think) are impossible to progress with unless you wait an extra day or pay money. Connection issues with game are also prevelant. Trying to log in without wifi is borderline impossible while logging in using the same amount of connection is possible in oh my dog.

Unfortunately the first event is pay2 win and not even slightly you would probably have to spend atleast $100 just to get something good because they don't allow you to get them through any in game currency. So don't download this game it's a waste unless you spend alot of money on games already. I'm truly disappointed and I already spent over $50 on the game myself. In summary this game will be dead soon with this.

data.text: It asks you to turn on notifications every single time you turn it on, super annoying. It's like a built in advertisement. I'm willing to update the review, the game is decent. But that ish is whack.

I'm not giving it 5 stars mainly because, there's a lot of like bonus packs and micro transaction things at the start, and most new people will buy them because they think it will help. But it really doesn't. But otherwise the games perfectly fine. Great job devs :)

Very fun and easy game with A LOT of free stuff. Free player friendly. The game is exactly like "Legend of Slime" but much better. One improvement is the lamp speed. Could go a lot more faster. So slow on opening.

Fun... Until the pay to win. It's a good time sink, gotcha with activities, nothing groundbreaking. The pay to win shows up early though, just dueled a guy with 1/2 my power and lost because he paid for the goodies that let you hit randomly above your weight class. I'd avoid the hassle, there's more than enough pay to win time wastes out there.

data.text: I like the game overall but many mobile games have this same formula. This game pigeon holds free players in an attempt 2 force ur wallet open. The only reoccurring ad 4 the in game currency is useless. All the useful ads r extremely limited, 2 per individual action but also 2 per day. All the timers r extremely long. The drop rates 4 gear r abysmal not even 1% after a certain progression into the game. It becomes pay 2 win or wait until tomorrow 2 progress. The arena is unbalanced as well.
data.replyText:
Hello, thank you for your comment.
Welcome to contact our gm via Discord Messenger if you have any question about the game. We will try our best to help you. Sincerely waiting for your arrival. Discord Link：https://discord.gg/rgX9GT9h4S

data.text: I have been playing this day ever since the release non-stop. I have been a f2p player and safe to say, this game isnt as much pay to win mostly, there are some cases as in paying for not watching anymore ads but if you are willing to ignore that it should be fine. There are some unfair advantages between f2p and p2w such as the sword that give you a lot of advantages in early game, it costs 0.99$ plus tax so.. Not much but if you are willing to play 24/7 non stop, you will reach far.
data.replyText: Dear player, thanks for your liking and support of the game. We will continue to release more interesting activities and content. For details, please follow the Facebook homepage: https://www.facebook.com/legendofmushroom

data.text: Yet another generic numbers go up game in a sea of idle games. You can easily earn most of the premium currencies from regular play. But as time goes on and free players start leaving instead of paying, this game will become P2W. Just because they'll no longer be getting the revenue from people watching ads instead of paying. These games are a dime a dozen with literally no creativity put into them. EDIT:Well gave it the ol college try, game is already P2W. Uninstalled, never to return.
data.replyText: It's common for mobile game to offer the option of top up to boost their power in a short time.But we focus more on long efforts of players' daily farming and team work.Give the game some time.It's more than that. If you have any ideas, welcome to contact us Discord：https://discord.gg/rgX9GT9h4S

data.text: Talk about micro monetization. WOW. This looks like it's slated for kids. Yet the amount of things one can buy is like any adult oriented game. You're aiming for the parents, maybe? The ads tend to run excessively long, with no counter as to how long they are doing to run. With an added 15 seconds of waiting at the end. Which means it's at least 45 seconds Per Ad.

This is an amazing game!!!!!! I got my pre registered stuff in the mail, for those wondering where you get it. So in my opinion this game is very addicting and fun, I highly recommend. the only bad part is the chat... We have people saying bad stuff and especially in the voice recordings... Very inappropriate behavior goin on in there so watch out if you're a minor. Besides that this game is great!

I have never left a 5 star review before but unlike most idle games I'm progressing at a decent pace (still relatively low level) and it doesn't feel like it's just going to abruptly end, it starts a bit slow but if it started too fast people would just burn out after 1 or 2 days

Same game, new skin. P2W hell. Toxic cesspool of a chat that can't be disabled (even with settings). Multiple different currencies, each with their own packs/battle passes, get shoved in your face. $300 packs available (shameless). 10000% value packs by the way, you're losing money by not buying their amazing packs (sarcasm). Hit a wall after around 500k+ power and can do nothing unless you pay. Ads all over the place. The only thing going for this is the art. Will be a dead game in a month.

data.text: It's just another "play this game for a few days, get stuck at a specific point in the world map, spend cash AND your time so you can progress a LITTLE further so you have to rinse and repeat the same process". At this stage, the game is more or less a cash grab, though there is content, it's a grind (cash or/and time) to get anything good, not to mention that there is little censorship in language, so best be ready to block a TON of people who say racist/sexist/harming words in world/clan chat

data.text: This game ain't no different from auto grind games but this one is by far the most entertaining one! It fits my gaming needs when I'm bored. I don't get tired of it. Everyday the game would have something new for you which keeps me wanting to see what's next! If you prefer a game that doesn't take up much of your time and energy or if you have a very busy job this game might just be right for you!

My account was banned after I requested a refund when a purchase I made had an error in the app. It was only $.29. The only way to get my account back is to spend the exact amount on an account that isn't even mine. I was basically told to kick rocks because that's the rule. "All accounts with a refund request get banned. The amount doesn't matter. " Customer service is a joke. What a waste of my time.

At first i mindlessly downloaded it from an add not expecting to keep it long. But everything from the animation and variety of things to collect to the people in global chat is an all round great experience in my book!

What an overload of nonsense. Level the character. Level the gear. Level the skills. Level the pals. Level the lamp. Level timer speed up coupons. Evolve the character. Mine. Research. Lamp thief. Dragon cave. Daily quests. Achievements. Spins. Pumpkin challenge. Freebies. Limited bundles. Blah blah blah. There was another 6 things I had to unlock in the manor alone. All meaningless and worthless. A game of zero substance.
data.replyText: Hi! Thank you for your comments and there would be many interesting gameplays in game. Have a try! It won‘t let you down. Also if you have any good ideas please pay more attention on our facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/legendofmushroom

data.text: It's okay. Nothing special. The biggest problem is creating events that cost SO much in order to have much chance and winning anything good. For those willing to use money it's much easier to get good stuff. Typical mobile game problems. Unfortunate.

data.text: Finally a idle game worth playing! Ive been playing for the past few days and I'm hooked! giving it a 4 star rating because the gear system might may need an overhaul not being able to keep gear that could be better for another class when you switch, I'm making content for it over on YouTube Search up Flackjacksons! love the game 🥰 love that you can collect pals to play with and ability to upgrade your gear. I love that you can customize what your gear looks like so they don't all look the same also. Easy to understand and simple to play.

i pre-registered in February but didn't receive and bonuses (I might be doing something wrong I don't know) and although the game is pretty cool I think it will take a very long time to get higher-up in the game but still it's an okay game but personally not my type so I will uninstall sorry.

data.text: Super cute game so far.I love that I can walk away from it.And I don't feel like I will miss something period I love the graphics and the little characters are adorable and I also love that it's not plagued by ADS.Like so many games are these days.It is super easy to learn and get a hang Of. and you don't feel pressured for peter play

I just started playing the game and I find it automatically starts you off playing without instructions. Also as I was trying close the game. There is no way for me close it. This should also be available for PC. I would definitely play it on my computer,
Unable to shut off sound until you are level 16. This is a ridiculous way to program the game and prevents me from listening to something else while playing. So it gets the boot.

Support barely understands English and doesn't answer questions properly. They tell you to create a second email to get rewards over "not a glitch". The game limits you to 3 chat reports daily, so -phobia runs rampant until players block them. Support doesn't respond to screenshots. Quests bug, support tells you to spend more money to buy a key to do the quest. Game is otherwise fun, but filter accomplishes nothing but censoring the words "game", "lesbian", and "sma". Hire better support than FB

This game said you get 3000 free draws if you download the game from the ad and the best weapon in the game and I did but I got absolutely nothing I only got a few prizes from pre-registering from Google but the prices aren't even that special don't download this game if you just want to waste your time. Pls fix your game, and everyone has pay to win items but am a free to win player 😡😡

It is a great game, but found out if you log in through facebook, they get your login from it and tries to login on it, so the security is nowhere to find, they tries to get everything from you to get advantage of it and possibly to steal all your private information

The game seems really fun so far. I do have one issue though. I like to listen to music while playing games and when I open this game it makes my other apps really quiet. Hopefully this can be fixed

I love the game. I just can't stand all these games saying watch ads for this and you can't watch them, or there are none, and it's really not right. Basically rubbing it in out faces when you see it and can't watch the ad. That needs to be fixed. It's Effed up yo

data.text: Literally in the hospital less then 48 hours and someone stole my clan, I was even logging on to assist with family help while I could in that time frame. Terrible terrible dev team for letting this happen. Was so invested into this about to lay down some cash to advance and make a real go at obtaining first and growing but this has made me do a 180 so damn happy this happened now and before I dumped 100s into the game. Uninstalled and do not recommend at all!!!!!!

data.text: No reset on game. If you mess up a min max say goodbye to your entire progress. P2w, obscenely greedy as usual. I contacted their useless "support" for help, to at least move my $ on another server so I can restart, or ask them for a reset on the same server, or a refund, and of course all they can say is no and they offer no help.
It very cute. The characters and animation are adorable. It's a little laggy when I completed "normal 1-10" and unlocking pals. that didn't unlock until 2-5. other than that, so far no complaints!

Pretty satisfied, it is a auto game with a gacha and has ads that might play. but I do like one main feature, any item you get, is automatically a wardrobe item, if you pay the .99 cents for the spear, the spear becomes a wardrobe item you can put on later when that weapon becomes pointless which is cool, thats about it
